messages.message: @Lee - re: advanced model setting, did the Cass user notice the in-app message which shows the change in model? Do you think we need to make it more prominent, or make it persistent as more messages come through?
It wasn’t clear if he noticed it tbh. But he definitely forgot it was on and wasn’t 100% clear if he knew the impact of leaving it on.

Ideally the implications of it being enabled need to be more prominent. I’d like to see something like a modal that appears the first time you turn advanced on explaining the difference in capabilitiy and cost.
Or if there was a counter near the chat entry field that shows how many units the current prompt will cost.
